pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Methods for State Space Models // Implements methods for Bayesian analysis of State Space Models. Includes implementations of the Particle Marginal Metropolis-Hastings algorithm described in Andrieu et al. (2010) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9868.2009.00736.x and automatic tuning inspired by Pitt et al. (2012) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2012.06.004 and J. Dahlin and T. B. Schn (2019) doi:10.18637/jss.v088.c02.
